name: PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions.attestation
description: attestation is an optional property of the PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions dictionary. This is a string whose value indicates the preference regarding the attestation transport, between the authenticator, the client and the relying party.

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
